info.name: Funnyjunk Solarized
info.description: A solarized version of the site funnyjunk with some element changes and things removed.
info.additionalInfo: - Hide the sidebar before installing - Hide the image boards bar (resets after 2 weeks) - Hide the social buttons - Hide the bottom navigation bar - To reset these options delete all cookies for funnyjunk.com *************************** v1.1 - Minor improvements
